settings.content: Grand Trading is a Canadian skateboard distribution company representing only the best brands in the business. We service retail shops from coast to coast across Canada. Skater owned and operated since 2013.

settings.title: CONTACT US
settings.content:

Grand Trading
105 Judge Road, Suite A
Toronto, ON M8Z 5B5
1.647.748.1200

settings.code: * indicates required

settings.title: About Us:
settings.content: eCommerce Canada was developed by experienced eCommerce entrepreneurs just like you! Founded in 2018 With over 40 years of combined experience in the field, we’ve experienced every stage of an online business and can advise on every area of planning, forecasting, development, design and promotion.
settings.content_3:
With over 15 years in the digital consulting, David Nagy made his mark as one Founders at LiveOutThere.com in 2009. By 2012, LiveOutThere was one of Canada’s fastest growing businesses employing over 50 people. David has led projects with notables such Virgin Mobile, HBO Comedy, General Motors, Rocky Mountain Soap Company, Livify and many others.

As a coach, consultant, trainer & keynote speaker, David has worked with organizations such as Canada Post, Global Affairs Canada, Digital Mainstreet, HRIA and more.

eCommerce Canada has grown it’s team in all eCommerce disciplines to support our customers across Canada. We support online retailers from coast-to-coast and help implement the tools and systems you need to become more successful.
